00057 typedef union {
00058         QEI_CFG_Type bmQEIConfig;
00059         uint32_t ulQEIConfig;

00072 /*********************************************************************/
00083 void QEI_Reset(LPC_QEI_TypeDef *QEIx, uint32_t ulResetType)
00084 {
00085         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_QEIx(QEIx));
00086         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_QEI_RESET(ulResetType));
00087 
00088         QEIx->QEICON = ulResetType;
00089 }
00090 
00091 /*********************************************************************/
00100 void QEI_Init(LPC_QEI_TypeDef *QEIx, QEI_CFG_Type *QEI_ConfigStruct)
00101 {
00102 
00103         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_QEIx(QEIx));
00104         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_QEI_DIRINV(QEI_ConfigStruct->DirectionInvert));
00105         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_QEI_SIGNALMODE(QEI_ConfigStruct->SignalMode));
00106         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_QEI_CAPMODE(QEI_ConfigStruct->CaptureMode));
00107         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_QEI_INVINX(QEI_ConfigStruct->InvertIndex));
00108 
00109         /* Set up clock and power for QEI module */
00110         CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (CLKPWR_PCONP_PCQEI, ENABLE);
00111 
00112         /* As default, peripheral clock for QEI module
00113          * is set to FCCLK / 2 */
00114         CLKPWR_SetPCLKDiv(CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_QEI, CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_CCLK_DIV_1);
00115 
00116         // Reset all remaining value in QEI peripheral
00117         QEIx->QEICON = QEI_CON_RESP | QEI_CON_RESV | QEI_CON_RESI;
00118         QEIx->QEIMAXPOS = 0x00;
00119         QEIx->CMPOS0 = 0x00;
00120         QEIx->CMPOS1 = 0x00;
00121         QEIx->CMPOS2 = 0x00;
00122         QEIx->INXCMP = 0x00;
00123         QEIx->QEILOAD = 0x00;
00124         QEIx->VELCOMP = 0x00;
00125         QEIx->FILTER = 0x00;
00126         // Disable all Interrupt
00127         QEIx->QEIIEC = QEI_IECLR_BITMASK;
00128         // Clear all Interrupt pending
00129         QEIx->QEICLR = QEI_INTCLR_BITMASK;
00130         // Set QEI configuration value corresponding to its setting up value
00131         QEIx->QEICONF = ((QEI_CFGOPT_Type *)QEI_ConfigStruct)->ulQEIConfig;
00132 }
00133 
00134 
00135 /*********************************************************************/
00141 void QEI_DeInit(LPC_QEI_TypeDef *QEIx)
00142 {
00143         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_QEIx(QEIx));
00144 
00145         /* Turn off clock and power for QEI module */
00146         CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (CLKPWR_PCONP_PCQEI, DISABLE);
00147 }
00148

00150 /*****************************************************************************/
00160 void QEI_ConfigStructInit(QEI_CFG_Type *QIE_InitStruct)
00161 {
00162         QIE_InitStruct->CaptureMode = QEI_CAPMODE_4X;
00163         QIE_InitStruct->DirectionInvert = QEI_DIRINV_NONE;
00164         QIE_InitStruct->InvertIndex = QEI_INVINX_NONE;
00165         QIE_InitStruct->SignalMode = QEI_SIGNALMODE_QUAD;
00166 }

00176 FlagStatus QEI_GetStatus(LPC_QEI_TypeDef *QEIx, uint32_t ulFlagType)
00177 {
00178         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_QEIx(QEIx));
00179         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_QEI_STATUS(ulFlagType));
00180         return ((QEIx->QEISTAT & ulFlagType) ? SET : RESET);
00181 }

00216 void QEI_SetPositionComp(LPC_QEI_TypeDef *QEIx, uint8_t bPosCompCh, uint32_t ulPosComp)
00217 {
00218         uint32_t *tmp;
00219 
00220         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_QEIx(QEIx));
00221         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_QEI_COMPPOS_CH(bPosCompCh));
00222         tmp = (uint32_t *) (&(QEIx->CMPOS0) + bPosCompCh * 4);
00223         *tmp = ulPosComp;
00224 
00225 }

00250 /*********************************************************************/
00259 void QEI_SetTimerReload(LPC_QEI_TypeDef *QEIx, QEI_RELOADCFG_Type *QEIReloadStruct)
00260 {
00261         uint64_t pclk;
00262 
00263         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_QEIx(QEIx));
00264         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_QEI_TIMERRELOAD(QEIReloadStruct->ReloadOption));
00265 
00266         if (QEIReloadStruct->ReloadOption == QEI_TIMERRELOAD_TICKVAL) {
00267                 QEIx->QEILOAD = QEIReloadStruct->ReloadValue - 1;
00268         } else {
00269                 pclk = (uint64_t)CLKPWR_GetPCLK(CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_QEI);
00270                 pclk = (pclk /(1000000/QEIReloadStruct->ReloadValue)) - 1;
00271                 QEIx->QEILOAD = (uint32_t)pclk;
00272         }
00273 }
00274

00367 /*********************************************************************/
00393 void QEI_IntCmd(LPC_QEI_TypeDef *QEIx, uint32_t ulIntType, FunctionalState NewState)
00394 {
00395         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_QEIx(QEIx));
00396         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_QEI_INTFLAG(ulIntType));
00397         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_FUNCTIONALSTATE(NewState));
00398 
00399         if (NewState == ENABLE) {
00400                 QEIx->QEIIES = ulIntType;
00401         } else {
00402                 QEIx->QEIIEC = ulIntType;
00403         }
00404 }
00405

00461 void QEI_IntClear(LPC_QEI_TypeDef *QEIx, uint32_t ulIntType)
00462 {
00463         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_QEIx(QEIx));

00470 /*********************************************************************/
00480 uint32_t QEI_CalculateRPM(LPC_QEI_TypeDef *QEIx, uint32_t ulVelCapValue, uint32_t ulPPR)
00481 {
00482         uint64_t rpm, clock, Load, edges;
00483 
00484         // Get current Clock rate for timer input
00485         clock = (uint64_t)CLKPWR_GetPCLK(CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_QEI);
00486         // Get Timer load value (velocity capture period)
00487         Load  = (uint64_t)(QEIx->QEILOAD + 1);
00488         // Get Edge
00489         edges = (uint64_t)((QEIx->QEICONF & QEI_CONF_CAPMODE) ? 4 : 2);
00490         // Calculate RPM
00491         rpm = ((clock * ulVelCapValue * 60) / (Load * ulPPR * edges));
00492 
00493         return (uint32_t)(rpm);
00494 }
